titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation of Members of the Senate in the case of Douglas R. Page v. Robert Dole, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. Directs the Senate Legal Counsel to represent the present and former Members of the Senate who are defendants in the case of Douglas R. Page v. Robert Dole, et al.
